page.title: 16I CHOSE TO LIVE AT HOWNAM
page.content: Unlike the majority of people in the Hownam area in the Scottish Borders, who live here because of their jobs on local farms,we chose to live here.We have had our house in Hownam for 13 years,and for most of that time we used it as a holiday home.We always intended to live here at some point in our lives,but as our 4 sons grew up, it became clear that we could move here sooner rather than later.It has made my husbands life more difficult - he is an English barrister - with the extra travelling and the possibility of being blocked in during the winter, but the benifits in terms of peaceful and beautiful surroundings and a slower way of life,far out-weigh the difficulties.Having lived here very happily for 2 years now on a permanant basis I know I could never willingly go back to noisy city life.
